name: ULTIBATOR
description:
ULTIBATOR

Beta Version

Collaborators: Yujing Shi, Yuelin Luo, Yayi Tan, Bei Yan

How will assisted reproductive technology influence the future? ULTIBATOR is an adventure game that discovers a possible future. This prototype text game version records each selection of the player's choices and the possible ending triggered.

In a posthuman future world of high-tech development, the creation of the Ultibator causes multiple effects on the whole society including reproduction, technology, labor, resources, human rights, hierarchy, demography, family structure, religious belief, power and control. 

Having witnessed this world's end, the protagonist(player) lands in this world as a servant guardian of the Ultibator.  Turn back time and try to alter the eventual demise.
